section.title: CampTent/CampTentEx
section.para: This script is an expanded version of CampTent, and includes a larger number of optional properties in order to create more elaborate tents. CampTentEx includes support for up to 3 follower bed rolls, 2 additional lanterns, new clutter options, and more.

section.title: CampTentEx/TentAsset_ClutterActivator1
section.para: Optional: An activator to place in or around the tent. }
